article_title: Frankfort summit focuses on changing health care landscape
article_text: The old health care model "is rapidly falling apart," said Chas Roades, chief research officer for The Advisory Board Company, a Washington-based consultant firm that led a health care summit Thursday organized by the state Cabinet for Health and Family Services, the Kentucky Hospital Association and Gov. Steve Beshear.

article_metadata.news-keywords: health, care, summit, frankfort, beshear, obamacare, affordable, act, doctor, deductibles, patients, providers, hospital, lawmakers, insurance

The old health care model "is rapidly falling apart," said Chas Roades, chief research officer for The Advisory Board Company, a Washington-based consultant firm that led a health care summit Thursday organized by the state Cabinet for Health and Family Services, the Kentucky Hospital Association and Gov.
